title: Plat 5 player LF duo
body: Just looking for any chilled out easy going gold2+ players for casual duo fun times.

replies.body:
IGN: Cooldudets
Role: Mid, ADC, Supp
Rank: Plat 4
Add me and we can duo if u want :) im also looking for a good duo partner too
got 2 in gold, highest gold 3 75lp, add me if u want to play
Well I'm Gold 2 (won 15/20 last games) 99 LP and I usually main Mid/ADC. I don't play much, but I do mostly play at least one game everyday. You can add me if you want
wouldnt say i main one role, mostly play adc/mid/sup
